name: Ideal Cup
description:
The premise is simple: You have a cannon that you can move back and forth, and you fire bouncy balls with the ultimate goal of landing one in each of the glowing cups in the 10 levels.

You're trying to optimize for 3 scores: speed (be fast!), balls (shoot less!), and bounces (don't hit the walls if you don't have to!).

There you go, that's the game!

A bit of history, for the loremasters:

At the start of 2020, I looked back and realized I'd made a lot of games 50%+ of the way there and then stopped. I wanted to complete a project. So I picked up a bite-sized project to make a 10-level ball-bouncing game. I took a couple Saturdays and put it all together, then polished it up.

I consdier this project complete. There's some weird rendering bug that flickers lines on the screen occasionally, and level 10 did not turn out as well as I'd hoped for the final level, but I have a lot of fun going back and playing this every now and then. I hope you do too!
